cluster_relations.rel_desc: Cautionary tales embodied by urban legends mirror or reflect the fears and anxieties present in society.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject narrative or tale symbolically represents or mirrors the fears, anxieties, or concerns present in a society.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Societal Fears and Anxieties in Legends

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Function: moral or warning function linked to social concerns

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories depict predatory strangers as part of their narrative content.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories describe haunted houses characterized by dark pasts.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject narrative portrays, includes, or represents the object as part of its narrative content (e.g., characters, threats, cursed items, or backstories).
remarks: Haunted houses themselves are not separate entities in this chunk; relation focuses on dark pasts as the represented aspect.
